attributes.action: Immediate General Election as Government has broken manifesto promises
attributes.additional_details: An immediate general election is essential to restore democratic legitimacy and public trust. With growing dissatisfaction over economic hardship, NHS pressures, and leadership instability, the current government no longer reflects the priorities of the people. A fresh mandate would allow voters to choose a direction that aligns with today’s challenges and expectations. It’s a vital step toward transparency, accountability, and renewed confidence in our democratic institutions.
attributes.background: The British public demands an immediate general election. The Government has failed to deliver the change it promised, and voters deserve the chance to choose a new direction that reflects today’s priorities, challenges, and expectations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/727309
